October Xk, i960
mss Ruth Nusbaura
ll6 I^Tadhurat Avenue
Otarouto, Ontario
fSw-nn/to-
Dear Ruths
I owe you a terrific apology but my mother passed away August 22
ana I have been 111 and away from the office most of the time since
then* I am back for short periods of time now and I found your
letter of September 26 which no one else in the office had answered
since it was addressed to me. I am enclosing the completed form
plus a letter for the Unemployment Insurance Commission and I do
hope the delay has not inconvenienced you too much. Hope to hear
from you when you have time.
Sincerely,
(ite.) Rose Schmidt
Staff Associate
